name: Ludochess (Concept)
description:
This is a game where you play an in-universe board game called Ludochess.

It uses basic chess rules, with the twist that the pieces come with a certain amount of HP, and their attack and defense values are based on dice rolls. The pieces will also perform joint attack or defense based on their ranges.

The game is meant to be an entry to the Greenlight Jam and is now in ideation phase.
